list_definition.definition: to read a text to see if there are any errors and correct them

list_ex_of_english: It has also been carefully produced and proofread, with barely a typo.
Similarly, half of the read write measure is composed of passage comprehension, whereas the other half is composed equally of proofreading and dictation (one-quarter each).
Similar comparisons with adults are more difficult because adults produce many fewer errors when proofreading and writing.
Often writers have no experience of editing and proofreading their text.
While they are excellent tools to help proofread documents and even improve the writer's ability to spell they have their limitations.
Last, but not least, on the negative side that is, the book is rather sloppily edited\proofread.
They allow people to write and proofread text.
This hand also wrote out the initials as he wrote out the text, before proofreading, as is evidenced by errors that he made in enumeration.
